description: PRIVATE END UNIT on GREENBELT with MASSIVE OUTDOOR LIVING SPACE This 2-storey, 1263 sq ft townhouse offers maximum privacy, attached only by the garage. Enjoy an expansive wrap-around deck backing onto a peaceful greenbelt. The bright, open layout feels like a detached home. Features include a stunning oak kitchen, modern lighting, stylish countertops, refreshed bathrooms, laminate flooring, and tile in bathrooms. Rare parking for two vehicles right in front of your garage. Cozy up by the unique wood-burning fireplace. KID FRIENDLY complex centrally located on the West side of Maple Ridge, walking distance to shopping, schools, transportation, and amenities. This unit needs to be seen to be appreciated, schedule your private showing today!
